channel.title: Allantois
channel.description:
Download: http://allantois.net/download Play: http://allantois.net/play Forum: http://allantois.net/vb
Allantois is a Economy based server in the 317 revision; the economy will be strict as well as the skills, the positive side to exp being hard to get up is to prevent everyone walking around with skillcapes it'll help bring back that hard work and becomes more and more worth a show off based on the skill. Most rsps' out there have terribly written code, the skills are half 'assed' and within short period of time the rsps goes down; Skills, bosses, minigames, core work will be done properly and efficient. Allantois strives to have the latest and greatest content that a rsps could possibly have, with many plans and a bright future for this server we can only hope that you show your love and support to the project as it now begins development! Allantois will also have numerous quests handled properly and most efficiently, Expect to play through some vigorous and challenging quests and some more relaxed quests, some quests may involve killing nearly impossible bosses and tough puzzles to solve; Just like runescape quests will be required to be completed to wear/wield certain weapons.
All skills will be done by what the RuneScape wikipedia goes by. Every skill will be like RS with many locations to train at, rewards etc! For example one of the many amazing skills to train, Construction is just like Runescape, you'll be able to build your own furniture, rooms, even dungeons; Feeling lonely inside your house all by yourself? No worries you'll be able to invite other users in Allantois into your own house and do whatever you have to offer for them.
We wish nothing but the best experience for the player, let them enjoy the content we produce for them and make them come back for more fun. Developers at Allantois work hard so you the player can enjoy. Professional staff team will assist any problems you may encounter.
Site - [url=http://allantois.net/]http://allantois.net/[/url] YouTUbe - [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/Allantois317]http://www.youtube.com/user/Allantois317[/url] Twitter - [url=https://twitter.com/Allantois317]https://twitter.com/Allantois317[/url] Facebook - [url=https://www.facebook.com/pages/Allantois/535485799838138]https://www.facebook.com/pages/Allantois/535485799838138[/url] Wikia - [url=http://allantois317.wikia.com/wiki/Allantois.net_Wiki]http://allantois317.wikia.com/wiki/Allantois.net_Wiki[/url]
Some of the countless features that we can offer for our users to enjoy is some of the following:
- 100% Realistic RuneScape construciton (Housing building, Dungeon ceating, everything eles that RS construction offers) - 100% Realistic Summoning (Pouch creation, Specials, etc) - Never before seen login screen + Registration on the client itself - Player Shadows - HD Floor textures - Quest(s) - Lots of quests to soon be released - Soul Wars - Fist of Guthix - Real runescape music, sound, toggable music - 100% Notes tab - Ancient effigies - Clan wars (Safe, dangerous, clan battling) - All spells working (Modern, Ancient, Lunar) - 22 fully functional skills (Dungoneering coming soon) - VIP users can recieve their own @allantois.net email (example@allantois.net) - user friendly site/forum - Professional staff - Weekly updates - Optional swift kit client feature upon loadup - Countless Monsters & Bosses to fight - 100% Clan Chat - 100% Grand Exchange (using real interfaces, buying, selling, etc) - 99.9% uptime - Tooltip hovering (toggable) - Extremely friendly community - Friendly Staff & Support - Full godwars (Nex like you've never seen before) - Bank Pin system - Perfect switching - Duel arena, barrows, fight caves, fight pits, pest control, etc - Tormented Demons - Highscores - Self updating client & light weight client - Economy - Ancient curses, Korasi’s sword, Godswords, dragon claws, skillcape emotes, etc - Voting rewards, help us by voting, and be rewarded! - 230 members signed up already - Active PVM & PVP - numbers Members & VIP features - Sound effects (eating, drinking, teleporting, etc) - Fullscreen & Resizable - Quick prayers - Community updloads (request a video of you ingame to the official video page on allantois - [url=http://www.allantois.net/videos]http://www.allantois.net/videos[/url]) - Community interactive - Barrel chest - bork - Daggonoth Kings - Corp
Several more content to be explored, give us a chance! You won't regret it! Don't let these pictures decide if you want to join, join and you'll see a reason to stay! Start your adventure today!
Pictures: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uRr3UK2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fjdaMck.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kfg6kPi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VP3xe3k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8LW2Ccv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jFFQBLh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l90Zttz.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qwY7mzZ.png?1?1565[/img]

item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

Download: http://allantois.net/download
Play: http://allantois.net/play
Forum: http://allantois.net/vb

Allantois is a Economy based server in the 317 revision; the economy will be strict as well as the skills, the positive side to exp being hard to get up is to prevent everyone walking around with skillcapes it’ll help bring back that hard work and becomes more and more worth a show off based on the skill. Most rsps’ out there have terribly written code, the skills are half ‘assed’ and within short period of time the rsps goes down; Skills, bosses, minigames, core work will be done properly and efficient. Allantois strives to have the latest and greatest content that a rsps could possibly have, with many plans and a bright future for this server we can only hope that you show your love and support to the project as it now begins development! Allantois will also have numerous quests handled properly and most efficiently, Expect to play through some vigorous and challenging quests and some more relaxed quests, some quests may involve killing nearly impossible bosses and tough puzzles to solve; Just like runescape quests will be required to be completed to wear/wield certain weapons.

All skills will be done by what the RuneScape wikipedia goes by. Every skill will be like RS with many locations to train at, rewards etc!
For example one of the many amazing skills to train, Construction is just like Runescape, you’ll be able to build your own furniture, rooms, even dungeons;
Feeling lonely inside your house all by yourself? No worries you’ll be able to invite other users in Allantois into your own house and do whatever you have to offer for them.

We wish nothing but the best experience for the player, let them enjoy the content we produce for them and make them come back for more fun.
Developers at Allantois work hard so you the player can enjoy. Professional staff team will assist any problems you may encounter.

Some of the countless features that we can offer for our users to enjoy is some of the following:

  • 100% Realistic RuneScape construciton (Housing building, Dungeon ceating, everything eles that RS construction offers)
  • 100% Realistic Summoning (Pouch creation, Specials, etc)
  • Never before seen login screen + Registration on the client itself
  • Player Shadows
  • HD Floor textures
  • Quest(s) - Lots of quests to soon be released
  • Soul Wars
  • Fist of Guthix
  • Real runescape music, sound, toggable music
  • 100% Notes tab
  • Ancient effigies
  • Clan wars (Safe, dangerous, clan battling)
  • All spells working (Modern, Ancient, Lunar)
  • 22 fully functional skills (Dungoneering coming soon)
  • VIP users can recieve their own @allantois.net email (example@allantois.net)
  • user friendly site/forum
  • Professional staff
  • Weekly updates
  • Optional swift kit client feature upon loadup
  • Countless Monsters & Bosses to fight
  • 100% Clan Chat
  • 100% Grand Exchange (using real interfaces, buying, selling, etc)
  • 99.9% uptime
  • Tooltip hovering (toggable)
  • Extremely friendly community
  • Friendly Staff & Support
  • Full godwars (Nex like you’ve never seen before)
  • Bank Pin system
  • Perfect switching
  • Duel arena, barrows, fight caves, fight pits, pest control, etc

  • Highscores
  • Self updating client & light weight client
  • Economy
  • Ancient curses, Korasi’s sword, Godswords, dragon claws, skillcape emotes, etc
  • Voting rewards, help us by voting, and be rewarded!
  • 230 members signed up already
  • Active PVM & PVP
  • numbers Members & VIP features
  • Sound effects (eating, drinking, teleporting, etc)
  • Fullscreen & Resizable
  • Quick prayers
  • Community updloads (request a video of you ingame to the official video page on allantois - http://www.allantois.net/videos)
  • Community interactive

  • Daggonoth Kings
  • Corp

Several more content to be explored, give us a chance! You won’t regret it!
Don’t let these pictures decide if you want to join, join and you’ll see a reason to stay!
Start your adventure today!
